019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu;
020
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype.jsr310.JavaTimeModule;
023import com.google.gson.Gson;
024import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
025import io.kubernetes.client.apimachinery.GroupVersionKind;
026import io.kubernetes.client.custom.Quantity;
027import io.kubernetes.client.custom.Quantity.Format;
028import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
029import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
030import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.JSON;
031import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.EventsV1Event;
032import java.io.IOException;
033import java.math.BigDecimal;
034import java.util.logging.Level;
035import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.APP_NAME;
036import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.VM_OP_GROUP;
037import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.VM_OP_KIND_VM;
038import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8s;
039import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.VmDefinition;
040import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.VmDefinitionStub;
041import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.BalloonChangeEvent;
042import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.ConfigureQemu;
043import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.DisplayPasswordChanged;
044import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.Exit;
045import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.HotpluggableCpuStatus;
046import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.OsinfoEvent;
047import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerStateChange;
048import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerStateChange.RunState;
049import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.ShutdownEvent;
050import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.GsonPtr;
051import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
052import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
053import org.jgrapes.core.events.HandlingError;
054import org.jgrapes.core.events.Start;
055
056/**
057 * Updates the CR status.
058 */
059@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
060public class StatusUpdater extends VmDefUpdater {
061
062    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.FieldNamingConventions")
063    private static final Gson gson = new JSON().getGson();
064    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.FieldNamingConventions")
065    private static final ObjectMapper objectMapper
066        = new ObjectMapper().registerModule(new JavaTimeModule());
067
068    private long observedGeneration;
069    private boolean guestShutdownStops;
070    private boolean shutdownByGuest;
071    private VmDefinitionStub vmStub;
072
073    /**
074     * Instantiates a new status updater.
075     *
076     * @param componentChannel the component channel
077     */
078    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ConstructorCallsOverridableMethod")
079    public StatusUpdater(Channel componentChannel) {
080        super(componentChannel);
081        attach(new ConsoleTracker(componentChannel));
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * On handling error.
086     *
087     * @param event the event
088     */
089    @Handler(channels = Channel.class)
090    public void onHandlingError(HandlingError event) {
091        if (event.throwable() instanceof ApiException exc) {
092            logger.log(Level.WARNING, exc,
093                () -> "Problem accessing kubernetes: " + exc.getResponseBody());
094            event.stop();
095        }
096    }
097
098    /**
099     * Handle the start event.
100     *
101     * @param event the event
102     * @throws IOException 
103     * @throws ApiException 
104     */
105    @Handler
106    public void onStart(Start event) {
107        if (namespace == null) {
108            return;
109        }
110        try {
111            vmStub = VmDefinitionStub.get(apiClient,
112                new GroupVersionKind(VM_OP_GROUP, "", VM_OP_KIND_VM),
113                namespace, vmName);
114            vmStub.model().ifPresent(model -> {
115                observedGeneration = model.getMetadata().getGeneration();
116            });
117        } catch (ApiException e) {
118            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
119                () -> "Cannot access VM object, terminating.");
120            event.cancel(true);
121            fire(new Exit(1));
122        }
123    }
124
125    /**
126     * On runner configuration update.
127     *
128     * @param event the event
129     * @throws ApiException 
130     */
131    @Handler
132    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals")
133    public void onConfigureQemu(ConfigureQemu event)
134            throws ApiException {
135        guestShutdownStops = event.configuration().guestShutdownStops;
136
137        // Remainder applies only if we have a connection to k8s.
138        if (vmStub == null) {
139            return;
140        }
141
142        // A change of the runner configuration is typically caused
143        // by a new version of the CR. So we update only if we have
144        // a new version of the CR. There's one exception: the display
145        // password is configured by a file, not by the CR.
146        var vmDef = vmStub.model();
147        if (vmDef.isPresent()
148            && vmDef.get().metadata().getGeneration() == observedGeneration
149            && (event.configuration().hasDisplayPassword
150                || vmDef.get().statusJson().getAsJsonPrimitive(
151                    "displayPasswordSerial").getAsInt() == -1)) {
152            return;
153        }
154        vmStub.updateStatus(vmDef.get(), from -> {
155            JsonObject status = from.statusJson();
156            if (!event.configuration().hasDisplayPassword) {
157                status.addProperty("displayPasswordSerial", -1);
158            }
159            status.getAsJsonArray("conditions").asList().stream()
160                .map(cond -> (JsonObject) cond).filter(cond -> "Running"
161                    .equals(cond.get("type").getAsString()))
162                .forEach(cond -> cond.addProperty("observedGeneration",
163                    from.getMetadata().getGeneration()));
164            return status;
165        });
166    }
167
168    /**
169     * On runner state changed.
170     *
171     * @param event the event
172     * @throws ApiException 
173     */
174    @Handler
175    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AssignmentInOperand",
176        "PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition" })
177    public void onRunnerStateChanged(RunnerStateChange event)
178            throws ApiException {
179        VmDefinition vmDef;
180        if (vmStub == null || (vmDef = vmStub.model().orElse(null)) == null) {
181            return;
182        }
183        vmStub.updateStatus(vmDef, from -> {
184            JsonObject status = from.statusJson();
185            boolean running = event.runState().vmRunning();
186            updateCondition(vmDef, vmDef.statusJson(), "Running", running,
187                event.reason(), event.message());
188            updateCondition(vmDef, vmDef.statusJson(), "Booted",
189                event.runState() == RunState.BOOTED, event.reason(),
190                event.message());
191            if (event.runState() == RunState.STARTING) {
192                status.addProperty("ram", GsonPtr.to(from.data())
193                    .getAsString("spec", "vm", "maximumRam").orElse("0"));
194                status.addProperty("cpus", 1);
195
196                // In case we had an irregular shutdown
197                status.remove("osinfo");
198            } else if (event.runState() == RunState.STOPPED) {
199                status.addProperty("ram", "0");
200                status.addProperty("cpus", 0);
201                status.remove("osinfo");
202            }
203
204            // In case console connection was still present
205            if (!running) {
206                status.addProperty("consoleClient", "");
207                updateCondition(from, status, "ConsoleConnected", false,
208                    "VmStopped", "The VM has been shut down");
209            }
210            return status;
211        });
212
213        // Maybe stop VM
214        if (event.runState() == RunState.TERMINATING && !event.failed()
215            && guestShutdownStops && shutdownByGuest) {
216            logger.info(() -> "Stopping VM because of shutdown by guest.");
217            var res = vmStub.patch(V1Patch.PATCH_FORMAT_JSON_PATCH,
218                new V1Patch("[{\"op\": \"replace\", \"path\": \"/spec/vm/state"
219                    + "\", \"value\": \"Stopped\"}]"),
220                apiClient.defaultPatchOptions());
221            if (!res.isPresent()) {
222                logger.warning(
223                    () -> "Cannot patch pod annotations for: " + vmStub.name());
224            }
225        }
226
227        // Log event
228        var evt = new EventsV1Event()
229            .reportingController(VM_OP_GROUP + "/" + APP_NAME)
230            .action("StatusUpdate").reason(event.reason())
231            .note(event.message());
232        K8s.createEvent(apiClient, vmDef, evt);
233    }
234
235    /**
236     * On ballon change.
237     *
238     * @param event the event
239     * @throws ApiException 
240     */
241    @Handler
242    public void onBallonChange(BalloonChangeEvent event) throws ApiException {
243        if (vmStub == null) {
244            return;
245        }
246        vmStub.updateStatus(from -> {
247            JsonObject status = from.statusJson();
248            status.addProperty("ram",
249                new Quantity(new BigDecimal(event.size()), Format.BINARY_SI)
250                    .toSuffixedString());
251            return status;
252        });
253    }
254
255    /**
256     * On ballon change.
257     *
258     * @param event the event
259     * @throws ApiException 
260     */
261    @Handler
262    public void onCpuChange(HotpluggableCpuStatus event) throws ApiException {
263        if (vmStub == null) {
264            return;
265        }
266        vmStub.updateStatus(from -> {
267            JsonObject status = from.statusJson();
268            status.addProperty("cpus", event.usedCpus().size());
269            return status;
270        });
271    }
272
273    /**
274     * On ballon change.
275     *
276     * @param event the event
277     * @throws ApiException 
278     */
279    @Handler
280    public void onDisplayPasswordChanged(DisplayPasswordChanged event)
281            throws ApiException {
282        if (vmStub == null) {
283            return;
284        }
285        vmStub.updateStatus(from -> {
286            JsonObject status = from.statusJson();
287            status.addProperty("displayPasswordSerial",
288                status.get("displayPasswordSerial").getAsLong() + 1);
289            return status;
290        });
291    }
292
293    /**
294     * On shutdown.
295     *
296     * @param event the event
297     * @throws ApiException the api exception
298     */
299    @Handler
300    public void onShutdown(ShutdownEvent event) throws ApiException {
301        shutdownByGuest = event.byGuest();
302    }
303
304    /**
305     * On osinfo.
306     *
307     * @param event the event
308     * @throws ApiException 
309     */
310    @Handler
311    public void onOsinfo(OsinfoEvent event) throws ApiException {
312        if (vmStub == null) {
313            return;
314        }
315        var asGson = gson.toJsonTree(
316            objectMapper.convertValue(event.osinfo(), Object.class));
317
318        vmStub.updateStatus(from -> {
319            JsonObject status = from.statusJson();
320            status.add("osinfo", asGson);
321            return status;
322        });
323
324    }
325}
